title: InStyle serif font... which is it?
content:
Pls can someone tell me which is this font. It was used for headlines in Instyle, but before the redesign this summer.  
It is most stylish serif that I have seen... So pls can someone help.

thanx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163049im_/http:/typophile.com/files/InStyle_4754.Cover.August07.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163049im_/http:/typophile.com/files/InStyleCoverWeb2_4154.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163049im_/http:/typophile.com/files/instyle2005cover_4205.jpg)

 [‹ please help!!!!!](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163049/http:/typophile.com/node/50551 "Go to previous forum topic") [Anyone who knows this font? or another that looks like it? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163049/http:/typophile.com/node/50535 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Bond1806

comments.content:
Off course it is... I was looking for it all over the net but it was in front of me all the time...  
Gorgeous font...

Thanx for the info.
Guess it’s just the colours, but this look very 90s-ish.
